revised_title: A Tenth Memoir on Quantics: Canonical Forms and Covariant Expressions
tldr: This article explores the theory of canonical forms and covariant expressions in binary quintics, focusing on the establishment of the Numerical Generating Function (N.G.F.) and Real Generating Function (R.G.F.) of covariants. The author also discusses the concept of segregates and congregates, and their relationship to syzygies and covariant functions.
